name: css-margin-pixels
description: Css module of single purpose classes for setting margins with pixel values

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-margin-pixels.css > css/css-margin-pixels.css && tachyons src/css-margin-pixels.css --minify > css/css-margin-pixels.min.css && tachyons src/css-margin-pixels.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
